itemDisplayName: ACOM example with VNet, Storage accounts, VMs, and NSGs
description: This template shows how to create a VNet with two subnets, two storage accounts, several front end and backend VMs in the subnets, and NSGs to control traffic between the subnets and the Internet.
summary: This template creates a VNet with two subnets, two storage accounts, and multiple VMs in each subnet.
